mapper.insert: insert into cart(member_num, GOODS_NO, GOODS_AMOUNT) values(#{member_num}, #{GOODS_NO}, #{GOODS_AMOUNT})
mapper.update: update cart set GOODS_AMOUNT=#{GOODS_AMOUNT} where cartId = #{cartId}
mapper.select: select a.cartId, a.member_num, a.GOODS_NO, a.GOODS_AMOUNT, G.GOODS_NAME, G.GOODS_SELL_PRICE, G.GOODS_SALE_PRICE from cart a left outer join GOODS G on a.GOODS_NO = b.GOODS_NO where member_num = #{member_num}
select * from cart where member_num = #{member_num} and GOODS_NO = #{GOODS_NO}
